summary: Advisory committees established via the Federal Advisory Committee Act shape public policy and government regulations, enhancing the quality and credibility of federal decision-making. The federal government spent about $373 million in FY 2019 to operate nearly 960 FACA committees. Several of the 11 committees we reviewed did not meet transparency requirements, such as making key decisions during open meetings or posting documents online as required...
title: Federal Advisory Committees: Actions Needed to Enhance Decision-Making Transparency and Cost Data Accuracy
